sample

Class Snake

  • java.lang.Object
    • sample.Snake

  • public class Snake
extends java.lang.Object
    This is the class for the creation of the Snake. The Snake has a particular Length and Color. The Snake Body is an Array of Balls (which are created using Circles).

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      This is the Constructor of the Snake.

      This method is used to delete a Ball from the snake.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Snake

        public Snake(Main m,
             Start start,
             java.lang.String col)
        This is the Constructor of the Snake. It sets the size of the snake equal to the number of initial balls (5 in our case).
        Parameters:
        m - It is the object of the Main Class.
        start - It is the object of the Start Class.
        col - It is the Value of the Colour of the Snake.

      • isCollidingWall

        public boolean isCollidingWall()
        This method checks if the Snake is colliding with any wall. It checks this by calculating the difference in the X coordinates of the Wall and the Snake.
        Returns:
        It returns the boolean value of whether collision takes place or not

      • isCollidingWall

        public boolean isCollidingWall(Wall w)
        This method checks if the Snake is colliding with a particular wall. It checks this by calculating the difference in the X coordinates of the Wall and the Snake.
        Parameters:
        w - It takes in the object of a particular Wall
        Returns:
        It returns the boolean value of whether collision takes place or not

      • snakeMoveLeft

        public void snakeMoveLeft()
        It is used to move the Snake left. This method changes the X coordinate of the Snake.

      • snakeMoveRight

        public void snakeMoveRight()
        It is used to move the Snake right. This method changes the X coordinate of the Snake.

      • delBall

        public void delBall()
        This method is used to delete a Ball from the snake.

        This method is used to add a ball to the Snake.
